question_stem.en: A 32-year-old man comes to the clinic for follow-up due to Crohn disease. The patient was initially diagnosed 3 years ago and achieved disease remission following a course of high-dose glucocorticoids. He remained in remission until 2 months ago, when he experienced an acute flare of diarrhea and abdominal pain that required a brief hospitalization and {{exhibit_1}} course of high-dose glucocorticoids. The patient completed a prescribed glucocorticoid taper earlier this week and says that his symptoms have returned to "about normal." Azathioprine maintenance therapy is started to help prevent future flares. Which of the following most accurately describes the expected effects of this new medication on immune function?
question_stem.zh: 一名32岁男性因克罗恩病前来复诊。患者最初于3年前确诊，在接受大剂量糖皮质激素治疗后达到疾病缓解。他在缓解期维持了2个月，直到2个月前，他经历了急性腹泻和腹痛的加重，这需要短暂的住院治疗和{{exhibit_1}}大剂量糖皮质激素的疗程。患者在本周早些时候完成了规定的糖皮质激素减量，并表示他的症状已恢复到“接近正常”。开始使用硫唑嘌呤维持治疗以帮助预防未来的复发。以下哪项最准确地描述了这种新药对免疫功能的预期影响？

question.en: Which of the following most accurately describes the expected effects of this new medication on immune function?
question.zh: 以下哪项最准确地描述了这种新药对免疫功能的预期影响？

A.en: B-lymphocyte count: ↓, T-lymphocyte count: No effect, Immunoglobulin level: ↓, IL-2 activity: No effect
A.zh: B淋巴细胞计数：↓，T淋巴细胞计数：无影响，免疫球蛋白水平：↓，IL-2活性：无影响

B.en: B-lymphocyte count: ↓, T-lymphocyte count: ↓, Immunoglobulin level: ↓, IL-2 activity: ↓
B.zh: B淋巴细胞计数：↓，T淋巴细胞计数：↓，免疫球蛋白水平：↓，IL-2活性：↓

C.en: B-lymphocyte count: No effect, T-lymphocyte count: ↓, Immunoglobulin level: No effect, IL-2 activity: ↓
C.zh: B淋巴细胞计数：无影响，T淋巴细胞计数：↓，免疫球蛋白水平：无影响，IL-2活性：↓

D.en: B-lymphocyte count: ↓, T-lymphocyte count: ↓, Immunoglobulin level: ↑, IL-2 activity: ↑
D.zh: B淋巴细胞计数：↓，T淋巴细胞计数：↓，免疫球蛋白水平：↑，IL-2活性：↑

E.en: B-lymphocyte count: ↑, T-lymphocyte count: ↑, Immunoglobulin level: ↓, IL-2 activity: ↓
E.zh: B淋巴细胞计数：↑，T淋巴细胞计数：↑，免疫球蛋白水平：↓，IL-2活性：↓

explanation.en: Azathioprine is an immunosuppression drug that inhibits purine nucleotide synthesis and incorporates false purine nucleotides into DNA and RNA. These effects reduce the proliferation of both B and T lymphocytes. The reduced number of activated B lymphocytes leads to reduced immunoglobulin levels, and the reduced number of activated T lymphocytes leads to reduced IL-2 activity. Common adverse effects include pancytopenia (ie, anemia, leukopenia, and thrombocytopenia) and increased susceptibility to infection. {{exhibit_2}}
explanation.zh: 硫唑嘌呤是一种免疫抑制药物，它抑制嘌呤核苷酸的合成，并将错误的嘌呤核苷酸掺入DNA和RNA中。这些作用减少了B淋巴细胞和T淋巴细胞的增殖。活化的B淋巴细胞数量减少导致免疫球蛋白水平降低，而活化的T淋巴细胞数量减少导致IL-2活性降低。常见的不良反应包括全血细胞减少（即贫血、白细胞减少和血小板减少）以及对感染的易感性增加。{{exhibit_2}}

summary.en: Azathioprine, an immunosuppressant used for Crohn's disease, works by inhibiting purine synthesis, which reduces the proliferation of both B and T lymphocytes. This leads to decreased immunoglobulin levels and IL-2 activity. The correct option reflects these effects.
summary.zh: 硫唑嘌呤是一种用于克罗恩病的免疫抑制剂，通过抑制嘌呤合成发挥作用，从而减少B淋巴细胞和T淋巴细胞的增殖。这导致免疫球蛋白水平和IL-2活性降低。正确选项反映了这些影响。
